M:
"Ears" Motifi pattern

Coding to design patterns is a new way for me, especially I found computer can easily repeat, which is a language always used in textiles design. And this repeat brokes what I initially drawing, forms another feeling of abstraction.

In this drawing, I began to draw a ear, and repeat eyes with different sizes, finally add little connections between them.

Self-portrait

This drawing is created by p5.js, an interesting javascript library, and in this drawing I illustrate myself, highlight the hair style that was created by random function in p5;

T: Ine no Funaya Houses伊根の舟屋
M:
Ine no Funaya Houses伊根の舟屋

It's inspired from the houses on the seaside of Kyoto, a place that fascinated me for a long time, as I have watched many Anime from childhood. Moreover, Japanese culture is one of my favorite topics.

It's also result in my color chosing for this drawing, which I think is because I just watched the film "isle of Dogs".

This drawing was created by p5, and I try to solve the "path finding question", to build a bridge between houses everytime refreshing with a different location

instruction drawing

I followed instructions of the artist "Sol LeWitt" to draw on openframeworks, a c++ library.

Self-Portrait imitating painting of Lucian Frued

Almost every child likes drawing, but I continue this habit till now. In childhood, I drawing without any rules and methods, but just draw everything out of my brain. In teenager age, I had teached drawing in the way used in Western, the tools, the perspective, colors, human body structures...And I was fall in love with the paintings of British Painter Lucian Frued immediately when I saw some pictures of him, even I brought one of his biographies, which is opened a window for that young boy. After nearly ten years, I had the chance to see his paintings in person. Even those paintings already familared by me from books, but it's still astonished when stand in front of the original.

This work is using computer to imitate the style of him, I stored the colors he frequently used and imitate the method he used, which he would spent several months to finish a painting, because he covers one layer color by another until he satisfy. In my progarm I upload a selfish and is automatically draw to another version

Stressport

I don't really like talk about politic, but I never fear to, because it's a chain tides with me, and links other. But sometime we have to talk about that, and this project is the chance.

As arts lover, I desire to have the life of real freedom, as much as possible, but the reality told me it's just my dreaming, because obrders are everywhere, as well as limitation. Before I made this project, I 'm "lucky" to have experience of half year quarantine in ShangHai. After that I went to UK, think I get the freedom. However, I found in order to get those freedom, you need complete a grade accumulated game, in which get a higher degree plus five points, join a charity organization plue 5. In the end, exchange the freedom by your grades, but the thing is, your may spent your whole life to win the politic freedom, but in the process you're never freedom any one of the days

Therefore, I hope my game is not grade accumulated game, but a slot machine game.

It's allowed everyone to get a random country, name... passport by open their camera and press their mouse. And you can try by yourself from

this link

Autumn Leaves

This drawing and some physical installation is inspired from both a song "Autumn Sweater" by Yo la tengo, and the process leaves falling from a tree.

A lot of sketches about leaves.

Take advantage of drawing on openframeworks, I can export the trace of leaves I draw to other software and convert it to physical objects by 3d-printing.

Red-Black Brush

The best thing of coding used for drawing is that not only the painter can get the fish, but also can make the hook. In this drawing, it's beginning with a brush made for mouse, and generate different patterns based on if the the mouse is pressed and the speed of its moving

timer

A functional timer allow user type minutes in the upper, seconds in the bottom, the timer will alarm when the blue cube walks to the time chosen. In this project I make thing functioning in the inconvenient way, but particularly design the color, the way how it's functioning

This program also give me the chance to calculate, which I'm not really good, and I'd like to learn some mathematical methods to let things becoming more efficient.

Magic glove

We chose situated ourself inside a world surrounded by electronics in this world, and they already became one of parts of our body, just like we may not leave our phone alway stick with us, and the using of it also changed our body, such as the curvature of rid. In this project, I try shown the interaction of body and electronics.

artwork by Takehito Etani up and Rebecca Horn below

It's not that we are willing to live with those hard materials, but we have to. In this project, I want design a soft electronic that share this body with us, and grow on there, becomes our friend, and have a symbiotic relationship with us

This is why I always combine textiles and electronics together because fabrics can be acceptable easily by our body, and this medium can connect body and hardware. Though coding, we can give fabric movements, some of those controllable, and the interesting is the uncontrollable, and if the uncontrollable become organized, the fabric would be like have their life

Cubes

Another pattern made by repeat a simple shape, and add animation to them with different rotation, scale.

Kites

A lot of 2 dimensional rectangle are layered together with measured scale from small to big, then the 2d drawing is like 3d, just like in painting, we add shadow, highlight, perspective to let the real object shown on paper

Flying house

There are a lot of beautifullity I haven't noticed before, it's maybe the rust on fence, the blur when passenger look out through windows of trains. In this project, I simulated the object in reality, to draw the tension I didn't pay attention before, such as the physical properties of gravity, floating. But compare solely science, I like science-fiction more, so I gave those balloons a house underneath, just like the film "UP", in which the house owner can travel with those balloons and land on his wife's dreamed waterfall

Andy Warhol In New York

There is a very valuable experience to be a graphic design intern in a fashion magazine of me, where I learned to talk by design symbols, different fonts, and layout, color... and in this project I write the program the college the photocopy of old newspaper wrote about andy Warhol, who is famous for using strong 2d printing.

As a man live along in London, where is the first time I live in other country, and this is why I am interested in this legendary, because Andy is a immigrant from a small place in europe to New York and began his artist career by working as a graphic design freelancer. As a result, I'm very curious about his experience, and I think I can learn something from it.

However, I don't really like his most famous colorful printing, but some works in his late life, which after he got the shoot. Those works are death and . It's expected, those works made by him is not welcomed, and In his late exhibition, few people came. So, I think most people just like colorful things, and it's let me confused but acceptable

I'm bleeding

This project is talking about the embarrassment after someone's overcaring. Compared in a crowed, I would chose be alone, and sometime I'd like to keep a distance with others, this isn't let me feel lonely, but more comfortable

age data

This project visualize the amounts of people who have long longevity, and it shows that women live longer than men. Before I searched this data, some men were very loud in deep night as they drank, and I think we need reflected sometimes

time to leave

Those years, because of studying outside my hometown, I seldomly contacted my parents, and the communication between us became very little. Instead of the happiness after talkING, we always havd conflict, which let both of us exhausted. However, they are always my parents, and I am their only child. We can't let another leave, but keep this situation

sketches by me above and by Chiharu Shiota below

So I made this project situation a ball shape child tied by tentacles, and try to simulated the tension between their two, especially one of They want to move a little far, but can't

play there

the desk

There are already tons of garbages filled on different places, while more garbages emerges everyday. This project is like my experiment to reuse wasted material to produce fashion products, and compared to let the wearer feels like a green activist, I'd like to let them truly love those products just because the item itself, which maybe made by the notebook just finished, or pencil slices after your draw a lovely painting. In this project, I chose materials from the desk that I and other four friends seat, and from their four respectively, to make four bags

The styx river

In this project, I think very big, it's give me a chance to think the society, and realize this world is full question, and everyone is living in a question, and I need to live with the question.

How do I know the question? Let me tell you an example.

Those are pictures from the paper in folk. They are documented the historic execution duck and ducking stool, they are both used for execute people and show to public, in order to prevent others do the criminals again. More accurate, I should not use criminals because the people killed in dock included disrespect royal family, and the latter one used for let women shut up. However, those people are truly killed. And I believe in that time, most of people may support the killing action, which was shown on some magazine's news, too many people to watch this execution, even someone has fallen into water. But not yet two hundred years, those actions are not defined as crime, but something good

And I'm very fear, especially I see people go the attraction to appreciate this sculptor or buildings, monuments, which are defined as good thing by governor, I would think what if those things be redefined as bad

What if something that will be believed as good after hundred years, but not now, should you do that? I don't know what I would chose, but it's seems like the options given by society are not that interesting. Every Time I saw they're celebrate the progress of society, l just want leave as far as I can. And sometimes, I would image I'm one of criminals executed in the way mentioned before, so let' me died if I'm worry, and my soul can be derived by the ferryman, and I get the silence in the styx river, then we leave to rebirth

In this project, I find a lot of references on sailing ship, which was used as the main transportation tool on sea, just like if I'm going to be killed on water, only a ship can help me run away. And it's can be weared on body, so it's becomes my weapon to help myself to do things I believed

And this project let me have a chance to walk through those historical places to trace the history, and fueled me learn the things do not have any connection with my life, and even already be "gave up" by the society. But I think this is the way I should insist to make artworks, to situate myself inside the vibe, and to learn from the project, even don't have any connections with me

Man in marsh

This project is built inside Unreal engine, which I used for building virtual human, and this is a way can be related to digital fashion.

Digital fashion is one of fields I'm very interested in, and I learnt to use different softwares to make clothes, and let it be worn on a virtual model

attempts I tried before to use "blender" "Clo3D" "Daz 3d"

This time game engine allows me to do things more flexible, compared just render pictures, there are animations, and real time simulation of fabric. And I try to a storyline inside, like a man is running to search the place he wants to stay, and he ran through mountain, to cave, to forest, even his body is broken, and he is alone.

T: I don't want to follow the path
M:
I don't want to follow the path

I have lived in London a year, and found there are a lot of cultural differences behind western world and eastern world, and this project is to explain this difference based on comparing the landscape painting and oil painting

Then I found there are routes inside the lanscape painting, to lead the viewer look through the path, and to let them feel they are walking on those road, and climb the mountain. But in most of those paintings, the end of the path is go into a mist, which brings mysterious. It can be related with the religious reason, as the god is can't be seen by normal people, in other words, they're living everywhere

But those unseenable is not positive for normal people, just imagin, when you try to argue with someone to fight for your rights, and they can't reply you a statement, but say "you don't need know" or "or I don't need to tell you". And this is how I really have experienced in there. Therefore, in this project, I want to sifit the angle and looking through those two dimensional painting, and find out what inside the painting, accurately I can find nothing, but this is a good wish for me to convery don't need view something by other's lead, but chose our own way

"bad"

A small work when covers the sheet on the bed, the screen under the bed will show "z".

Not Guilty

Although I describe my projects as artworks, I didn't purely made arts projects, which have not definitions before, like "textiles" "computational"...I wish I will have a chance to just make works without anything definitions but everything, and this is my understanding of the arts. and this project is very imporant for me, it's let me realize what the function of arts.

briefly, One of my parent had affair with a neighbor, and through some traces, I know that even I was not sure as the age of medium school. Until the after ten year, I just tried let my parents confirmed it because of I am in a emtional tough time. However, I finally realize how deep this hurt my parent. And this definitely a hit for the one, when they know their son know its from childhood. After that, the follow two years I can't really communicate with them, until I make this project, I want to have a chance to face it, and we talked, and I think We saved it

T: A day of a stock trader
M:
A day of a stock trader

A project I work on with sound, and visualization. Change and control the 3d scene by sound, and the movements of the camera
Filter

The 4th Dimension

Walking into a local bookstore, and finding a book that recorded the history of the new cross, where I stayed a year, the book showed this place was destroyed by a bomb in WWII, just in the supermarket I passed by everyday. This gives me a feel like the added together time layers, then open, the location is there. This place,51° 29' 0" North, 0° 20' 0" West, contained ruin, rebuild building, bomb, passagers, dead body...It's just the time to separate all of them.
